author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tub spout installation tips…I dry-fit the adapter about 1 inch from the tile and marked the copper. Then I cut the pipe, deburred the inside & outside, and secured the adapter with the provided set screw. The tub spout simply screws onto the adapter up to the tile wall. Pretty straightforward but don’t forget to prep the copper pipe. For more written tutorials and full videos about bathroom remodeling visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovations #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Tub Spout Installation Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
